ComicInfo.Summary:
Rubber Guns, Chapter 3: The Rubber Guns try to catch the crooks on the yacht.
Murder Society, Chapter 2 - Little Pricks: Charles tells a story about dealing with a bully.
The Chapel Chronicles: The Hats of London: Chapel goes to a hat design school.
Winter's Apprentice: Lucy is being trained to be an exorcist.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 11: The killer tried to blow up O'Connor and Hasan.
Kara Böcek, Part 1 of 4: The Black Beetle is in Istanbul for an item.
Death Rides a Bullet: Chapter 03: The Black Sinister falls to the mercy of the crowd.
